title: Grocery-store based nutrition education improves eating habits

title_detail.value: Grocery-store based nutrition education improves eating habits

summary: Hypertension affects over 60 million adults in the United States and less than half have their condition under control. A new study found that grocery store-based nutrition counseling was effective in changing dietary habits of patients being treated for hypertension.
